RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARSON'S RUN coaxed from the gate, raced just off the inside through the first turn before giving chased just off the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out five to six wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, dug in head to head with the runner up and gamely prevail by a neck on the wire. MOONLIGHT two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with the aforementioned for to take narrow and brief command a furlong out, dug in dueling to the finish with that foe but was ultimately bested at the end. FRONTLINE WARRIOR tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. MODICA coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside patiently handled until set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was overwhelmed by a trio a furlong out, then weakened to the finish. SHAMROCK SHAKE coaxed from the start, grew rank between foes shortly after the start and began losing action striding greenly while being corrected by the rider conceding four to five lengths of ground, chased just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing near the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and passed tired foes while unable to make an impact. YAQUI VALLEY coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home and tired. CORRUPTION came under coaxing at the start following a small stutter step, chased along the inside with the majority of the field through the first turn and into the backstretch, began to lose ground and bobbled slightly five furlongs from home, backed away to pair up with SHAMROCK SHAKE into the far turn, came under light coaxing midway, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Corruption
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Colburn Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, lost ground 5/8, 2w 1/4p, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Shamrock Shake
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, grew rank betw foes 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Carson's Run
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds and Bouchey Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 1/4, 5-6w upper, up ins 1/8, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Yaqui Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Frontline Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Modica
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrell Ventures LLC and Seaside Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, set down 2w 1/4p, overwhelmed 1/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 4w upper, up 1/8, dueled, bested

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 107. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCOCCIATORE tracked just behind the leader while inside of a foe, dropped from the three path to the rail early on the turn, was asked with three furlongs to run, gained in the two path into upper stretch then made a bid outside of the pacesetter, took the advantage just inside the furlong marker, responded well into the final sixteenth and held under strong urging. HIGH OAK settled well back under some urging, saved ground on the turn, turned into upper stretch under the crop, gained in the two path into the final furlong and finished with good energy to just get up for the place. SAFFA'S DAY was hustled to the front then angled in, showed the way down the backstretch, lugged out a bit into the turn then dropped from the two path to the rail, was asked for his best in upper stretch, lost the advantage to the winner just inside the furlong marker and was oufinished then lost the place near the finish but earned the show. OSBOURNE was urged along towards the rear, dropped back leaving the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path, was driven four wide into the stretch then quickly angled further out, remained on his inside lead while gaining in the final furlong, swapped to the proper lead inside the sixteenth-pole and improved for the last spot in the superfecta. MY HARBORS DREAM was urged along off the pace, dropped from the five path to the three path early on the turn, came four wide into the stretch, chased the vanguard in the drive and lacked the needed kick. FLOKI'S FLIGHT was sent hard from the gate, chased the pace on the outside, made a bid near the half-mile pole, moved from the four path to the two path early on the turn, dropped back under a drive into upper stretch and tired. BOLD JOURNEY was last to commence then hustled, moved to the outside near the five-eighths pole, dropped in late on the backstretch, was urged three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch then was carried out, remained on his inside lead to near the eighth-pole then swapped to the proper lead, drifted in shortly thereafter and lacked the needed response. JOEY FRESHWATER was rated off the pace under a tight hold, dropped back leaving the backstretch, was let out while moving from the two path to the four path on the turn then roused five wide into the stretch, chased past the three-sixteenths, swapped back to his inside lead at the furlong marker and faltered then was not urged while protected late.

ENTRY.NAME: My Harbors Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,5-3path turn,4w1/4,chased,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Saffa's Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: hstld,mvd in,pace,2p-ins trn,led to1/8,headed,outfinished,lost2nd

ENTRY.NAME: High Oak
ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled some urging,well back,ins turn,2p1/8,finished fast,up2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Joey Freshwater
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated,drp back7/16,let out 2-4p turn,5p1/4,chased,faltered1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,mvd out5/8,mvd in1/2,3w,5w1/4,carried out,drft in,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Osbourne
ENTRY.OWNER: Moquett Ron Tauber Mark Floyd Sagely Properties LTD Johnston Keith and LaPenta R
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,drop back 7/16,2path turn,4w1/4,angld out,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Scocciatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,ins foe,3p7/16,ask rail3/8,2p1/4,bid 1/8,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Floki's Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,chased outside,bid1/2,vied 4-2path turn,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 50000. (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VOLKERT just off the pace just off the inside in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and angled out four to five wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with LUNA WARRIOR and seized command from that rival just inside the eighth pole when brushing with that foe, then dug in gamely to fend off the challenge of that rival kept to task to the finish. LUNA WARRIOR broke a beat slow without incident and lost his lane to HATCH, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got set down angled six wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, got collared when brushing with the aforementioned foe inside that station, dug in under a drive fighting on to the finish but was ultimately rebuffed to the wire. STARRYSTARRYKNIGHT chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the show honors. WAR TERMINATOR coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. DEVILS ONLY FRIEND hustled from the gate, pressed the pace of KBCYA LATER from between foes in the two path, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in heads apart for command with three-sixteenths to go, then weakened in the late stages. HATCH chased along the inside, briefly floated to the two path before tucking back inside placed to coxing near the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. ISOCLINE broke a half a beat slow, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. CARPE'S DREAM coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late going. EL CONEJITO prompted the pace three wide outside the top pair, came under coaxing with five-sixteenths to go, swung five wide into upper stretch in the midst of being shaken off and weakened in the drive. KBCYA LATER hustled from the start, cut the pace along the inside under pressure from a pair coming under coaxing with five-sixteenths remaining, spun just off the inside into upper stretch under threat and yielded inside three-sixteenths to go, then weakened to the finish. BASIS RISK brushed the near side stall at the start, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide for home and offered no kick. EXCESS DEMAND chased four wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, went four to five wide at the head of the stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Kbcya Later
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, cut pressured pace ins, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 3-4w, set down 6w upper, up 1/8, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Hatch
ENTRY.OWNER: Epona Racing Stable and Toga Party Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Starrystarryknight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Basis Risk
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Carpe's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Devils Only Friend
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Politano James
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, pressed 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Isocline
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slow, chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 3-4w upper, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Volkert
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 4-5w upper, up ins 1/8, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Excess Demand
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: War Terminator
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: El Conejito
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORNER KICK was hustled from the gate, stalked the pace on the outside, engaged the leader in the three path on the turn, took over into upper stretch then kicked clear and drew away under strong urging to prove much the best. PARTY AT GRANTS bumped with a rival after the start then was taken up, raced towards the rear under coaxing, traveled around most of the turn in the two path, angled four wide outside the quarterr-pole then came six wide into the stretch, passed foes into the final furlong, drifted in late and finished with good energy to just get up for the place. BEST COAST angled in early while hustled, moved to the front then set the pace under pressure to her outside, vied inside on the turn, was asked under threat near the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage to the winner into upper stretch and proved no match then was denied the place near the wire but was clear for the show. SOUPER TROPICAL was urged along off the pace, went four wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while carried in late. CHEROKEE COTTAGE unseated her rider near the paddock path and ran loose for about three-sixteenths of a mile before being apprehended by an outrider, was deemed fit to run by the state veterinarian, departed the gate under urging, was ridden along on the outside, went four then three wide on the turn and came up empty. RATIFIED pressed the pace on the outside of the leader, chased in the two path through the turn and tired. KEEP IT SEXY was urged along off the pace, went around most of the turn in the two path then dropped to the rail and failed to threaten. SOUPER SLEWS CASH was well placed just off the pace, chased two then three wide on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch and capitulated. GRACEFUL was brushed in the hindquarters after the start, raced off the pace under urging, went three wide on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and was no factor. MOONEY MOONEY was hustled from the start while moving in, chased the pace, dropped back near the nine-sixteenths, saved ground for most of the turn then moved to the two path and had nothing left. DRAMATIC EFFECT was last to commence then bumped with a rival after the start and in a bit tight, angled out at the rear of the field, was hard ridden well out in the track while a bit green, went five wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Slews Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,just off pace,2-3path turn,4w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Tropical
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,4wide turn,5w1/4,carried in late,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Best Coast
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,angled in,to front,ins turn,headed 3/16,no match,lost2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mooney Mooney
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,moved in,drop back 4-1/2,ins-2path turn,nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Keep It Sexy
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,2path turn,rail outside 1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ratified
ENTRY.OWNER: Sparks William S and Finegan Randy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside leader,chased 2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Party At Grants
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,taken up,coaxed,2p3/8,6p1/4,drift in late,gd enrgy

ENTRY.NAME: Dramatic Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,angled out,green,hard ridden,5w,6w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Graceful
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,3wide turn,5w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Cottage
ENTRY.COMMENT: loose post parade,urged along outside,4-3p turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Corner Kick
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,stalked outside,bid 3p turn,took over 3/16,drw awy,drivng

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment D ue At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: Following a twenty minute delay due to lightning in the area, STERLING SILVER raced six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, angled in to the three path with three-sixteenths to go loosely splitting foes to take command just inside the eighth pole, then inched away under a drive kept to task. GOOD SAM six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, took over command with three-sixteenths to go, dug in drifting out a path and was collared inside the eighth pole, came in to get a better look at her main rival and was shaken off in the late stages while well clear of the rest and along second best. YOU LOOK COLD bobbled slightly at the start, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home and weakened in the stretch. ONTHEONESANDTWOS coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch under threat to the outside, yielded the front near the three-sixteenths and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Ontheonesandtwos
ENTRY.OWNER: Pura Vida Investments LLC Hutson Cindy M Madaket Stables LLC and Romano Thomas J
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 3-4w, 3-2w turn, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: You Look Cold
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bobble st, 5w backstretch, 2p turn, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sterling Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w early, 3-2w turn, 5w uppr, to 3p 3/16, up ins 1/8, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Good Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 4-3w turn, 5w upper, up, caught, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pre ferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERACTING was reluctant to load, came away in front then angled in while going to the lead, went around the first turn in the two path, opened up a sizable advantage on the backstretch, traveled around the far turn in the two path, was shaken up while still clear in upper stretch, swapped back to her inside lead after being put to a left-handed crop nearing the sixteenth-pole and held determinedly to prevail. STARTS NOW was restless in the gate, saved ground on the first turn, settled in the front half of the field, was urged along while inside on the far turn, gained three wide into the stretch under a drive, pursued the winner outside into the final furlong and missed while flattening out some but earned the place. LADY LAOBAN was reluctant to load, dropped in while showing early speed, moved from the rail to the three path on the first turn, settled towards the front, was urged along in the two path on the far turn then gained four wide into the stretch, chased the top two in the drive and finished willingly for the show. AUTUMN rounded the opening bend in the three path, settled on the outside without the benefit of cover, was urged three then four wide on the far turn, gained into upper stretch, chased to the finish and just missed the show. THE SPLENDID ONE became rank along the rail on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, moved from the rail to the three path under urging on the final turn, was drive five wide into the stretch, held a reasonable striking position into the final furlong but lacked the needed response. NORTH END LADY hit the inside of the gate at the start, traveled four wide on the first turn, settled well off the pace, was urged two then three wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SAIL WITH THE WIND was uneasy in the gate then broke a bit slow, bumped repeatedly with foes nearing the first turn then checked sharply, raced near the back under reserve in the two path, was urged on the far turn and never reached contention. BOMB SQUAD swerved out to avoid the bumping skirmish to her inside nearing the first turn, went three wide on that bend, settled off the pace, moved from three to five wide under urging on the far turn and failed to threaten. SHE'S A NATURAL broke near the back of the field, swerved out to avoid troubled horses approaching the opening bend, went three to four wide on the turns and failed to impact. SPLASHY traveled around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was urged in the two path on the far turn and failed to respond. SHINE MY TIARA bumped hard with a rival nearing the first turn then checked, saved ground on that bend, settled towards the rear, went two then three wide on the far turn and was no factor. BENEVOLENTLY hit the inside of the gate soundly and was off a bit slow, bumped repeatedly with a rival nearing the first turn then was taken up, tugged hard on the bit while rank in the two path around the opening bend, continued to pull hard on the bit early on the backstretch, brushed the rail late on the backstretch, moved from the rail to the two path on the final turn and also failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Shine My Tiara
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard 7-1/2,checked,ins1st,well back,2-3p2nd,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: The Splendid One
ENTRY.OWNER: Brodsky Alan and Hennig Mark A
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank rail1st,reserved,urged ins-3p2nd turn,5w1/4,chsd,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Sail With the Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,off bit slow,bmp repeatdly7-1/2,chckd bad,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Benevolently
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,bit slw,bmpd repeatedly7-1/2,tkn up,rank,ins-2p,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Starts Now
ENTRY.OWNER: Bloom Racing Stable LLC (Jeffrey Bloom) America's Pastime Stables and Krakow Rac
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,ins1st,settled,urged ins2nd,3p1/4,gain,flatten,miss

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Laoban
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard to load,ins-3p1st,towards front,urged 2p2nd,4p1/4,chased

ENTRY.NAME: Bomb Squad
ENTRY.COMMENT: swerved out into 1st,3p,off pace,3-5w2nd,6w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Splashy
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Rocco Steven Lee Jong and Cutair Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2path1st turn,off pace,urged 2path 2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Natural
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke near back,swerve out7-1/2,3-4w turns,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Autumn
ENTRY.OWNER: Newtown Anner Stud Farm and LNJ Foxwoods
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,no cover,3-4w2nd,gained,chsd,missed3rd

ENTRY.NAME: North End Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,4w1st,settled,2-3p2nd turn,5p1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Overacting
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard to load,angled in,2p1st,opened up,2p2nd,responded,held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEIZE THE GREY broke in at the start and was corrected, established the front shortly after and dueled with LAMBO to his outside, shook briefly away from that rival near the turn before being engaged in head to head combat once more with seven-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in holding well and clear to the finish kept to task. DORNOCH got bumped after the start in a chain of bumps begun by DRUM ROLL PLEASE, crossed to the inside forcing a pair of rivals in HOULTON and DIVINE EMPIRE to steady when shying from the tuck, advanced inside to be just off the duel, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and dug in under a drive running on to chase the winner home willingly to secure the place honors. GLOBAL PERSPECTIVE crossed to the two path soon after the start and chased just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. PRIVATE DESIRE lunged at the break, then got bumped by DRUM ROLL PLEASE into DORNOCH who in turn bumped HOULTON, chased just off the inside just off the duel up front, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and kept on to the finish. LAMBO dueled three wide with SEIZE THE GREY to his inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. DRUM ROLL PLEASE broke in at the start bumping PRIVATE DESIRE and commencing a chain of bumps in through to HOULTON, chased inside briefly before tipping two then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no rally. HOULTON got bumped at the start in a chain of bumps, raced just off the inside, then got forced to steady when shying in tandem with DIVINE EMPIRE as DORNOCH tucked in front from the outside, tipped out to chase three to four wide from that point on, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch and tired. DIVINE EMPIRE shied in at the start from SEIZE THE GREY breaking inwards from the outside and got corrected, raced along the rail early on and shied skipping along the fence when DORNOCH tucked in front and was steadied at the three-quarter pole, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, went three to four wide for home and made no impact. SKIP THE LINE four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and tired. DEVIL'S PLAYGROUND chased four then three wide under coaxing from midway on the turn, went seven wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, steadied 3/4, chased ins, 3-4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Seize the Grey
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, dueled 2p, coaxed 1/4, 3w uppr, edged away, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Houlton
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after st, steady 3/4, chased 3-4w, 8w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dornoch
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC R A Hill Stable Belmar Racing and Breeding LLC and Two Eig
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after st, just off duel ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, willing

ENTRY.NAME: Private Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge st, bumped after st, chased 2p, angled 6w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Drum Roll Please
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, bumped foes, ins early, 2-3w 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Playground
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lambo
ENTRY.OWNER: Heiligbrodt L William Heiligbrodt Corinne and Jackpot Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Global Perspective
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Skip the Line
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and Louis Lazzinnaro LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Alfred G. Vanderbilt H. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 112. Stakes Purse 350000. A HANDICAP FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $350 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,750 to pass the entry box and an additional $1, 750 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the publication of weights. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to th ird, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Trophies will be presented to the winning owner, trainer and jockey. Closed Saturday, July 15, 2023 with 15 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELITE POWER settled between foes under coaxing, dropped back outside the nine-sixteenths, started the turn in the two path, was roused while angling three then four wide later on that bend, gained outside into upper stretch, switched to the proper lead while put to a left-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths, pursued the runner-up under a continued left-handed crop into the final furlong, made a bid approaching the sixteenth-pole and got up in the final strides to prevail. GUNITE chased the pace down the backstretch, made a bid at the seven-sixteenths, vied in the two to three path on the turn, gained the lead inside the five-sixteenths, shook clear under a left-handed crop into upper stretch, switched to a right-handed crop while remaining on his inside lead outside the furlong marker, was pulled in by the rider to elicit a lead change outside the sixteenth-pole and made that change, led desperately under attack from the winner into the final sixteenth, fought under a brisk hand-ride late and was denied while well clear for the place. DEAN DELIVERS came away in good order, angled in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside of a foe while along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage inside the five-sixteenths, dropped back under a drive into upper stretch, chased into the final furlong and weakened but was well clear for the show. GUN IT raced just off the pace, was taken in hand outside the half-mile pole, dropped back and lost position significantly into the turn, saved ground while put to urging on that bend, moved out while remaining on his inside lead in upper stretch, drifted about in the final furlong and just earned the last spot in the superfecta. SYNTHESIS brushed with a rival while last to commence, settled at the rear, moved out some leaving the backstretch, was urged along in the three path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. AWESOME AARON brushed with a foe at the start, chased the pace between horses, went two then three wide on the turn and came up empty. LITTLE VIC tracked the pace on the outside, dropped back under urging while three then four wide on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Gun It
ENTRY.COMMENT: jst off pace,in hand1/2,lost position,ins,mvd out3/16,drftd,empt

ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,last away,settled,urged 3p turn,5p1/4,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 149500. INNER TURF (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUGH STREET chased three then four wide down the backstretch, tucked to the two path into the far turn briefly before tipping back out four wide with seven-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying to issue a challenge through the final furlong, seized command seventy yards from the finish and prevailed kept to task. MARIAH'S APPEAL bobbled and then bumped at the start with NEW GINYA and pinched that foe back when taking pressure from DIAMOND HANDS inside and ABSINTHE outside, established the front and showed the way rated along the inside, came under some pressure from ABSINTHE to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting guided out four paths to see the oncoming TOUGH STREET, got collared seventy yards from the finish and was along clear for the place honors. SHE CAUGHT MY EYE three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. ABSINTHE prompted the pace from the outside in the two path, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. NEW GINYA bobbled at the break, then got bumped between foes and was pinched back, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and made no headway. DIAMOND HANDS broke out at the start bumping NEW GINYA and pinching that foe back against pressure outside, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped to the two path straightened away and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Tough Street
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w pursuit, to 2p 1/2, tipped 4w 7/16, 5w upper, up fin 70yds

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Hands
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: New Ginya
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bump btw, pinched st, chased 2p, 6w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Mariah's Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped st, rated ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Absinthe
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: She Caught My Eye
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Jim Dandy S. Presented by DK Horse - Grade2 SARATOGA RACE 10 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 108. Stakes Purse 500000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $500 each which should accompany the nomination; $3,500 to pass the entry box and an additional $4,000 to start. For hors es not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $2,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to f ifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Grade One at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a Grade Two at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 4 lbs.; of a Graded sweepstake at a mile or over allowed 6 l bs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 15, 2023 with 14 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORTE came away in good order, dropped just off the pace on the initial straightaway, moved from the two path to the rail going around the first turn, was rated just off the pace, drafted inside while in the pocket behind the pacesetter on the far turn, was asked at the quarter-pole then came out and bumped ANGEL OF EMPIRE multiple times to create room into upper stretch, bumped again with that foe while turned out and given one pop of a left-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths then was carried out by the pacesetter, switched to a right-handed crop while gaining between foes inside the furlong marker, drifted in while getting to the runner-up late and got up to narrowly prevail. SAUDI CROWN moved in while coaxed to the front, saved ground on the first turn, was well rated while setting the pace, raced inside on the far turn, was asked inside the five-sixteenths, drifted out significantly inside the three-sixteenths, maintained a short lead under a right-handed crop while under attack into the final furlong, took a straighter course while in front into the final sixteenth, was carried in late and denied while able to get the place. ANGEL OF EMPIRE went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked at the seven-sixteenths pole, chased in the two path on the far turn, was bumped multiple times by FORTE and nudged out into upper stretch, bumped again with that foe while carried out outside the furlong marker then came under a right-handed crop, fought outside of the top two into the final furlong, drifted in some late and missed but was clear for the show. DISARM was hustled from the gate, saved ground on the first turn, settled under some urging, came under stronger encouragement late on the backstretch, traveled around the far turn in the two path while ridden along, was put to the crop near the five-sixteenths, angled out behind the vanguard in upper stretch then moved out further coming to the furlong marker, chased the top three on the outside to the finish and lacked the needed kick. HIT SHOW hit the outside of the gate and was off a bit slow, went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside under coaxing, was roused for more outside the half-mile pole, chased three wide on the far turn then was driven four wide into the stretch, drifted out near the three-sixteenths then was carried out, chased outside into the final furlong and capitulated. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE STRETCH RUN, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH

ENTRY.NAME: Disarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ins1st,settled some urging,2p2nd,angled out,outkicked

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p-ins1st,rated,draft ins2nd,came out1/4,bmpd foe,jstld,bid1/8,up

ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,off bit slw,3p1st,out,ask1/2,3w2nd,4w,drift out,empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2p1st,slkd outside,chsd 2p2nd,bid,bmpd1/4,forced out,jstld,miss

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 11 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEENS DANCER established the front from the get go and showed the way in hand along the inside under pressure from BUNTY WINDEMERE to the outside, remained patiently handled until set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, shook off the prompter nearing the eighth pole confronted to the inside, dug in dueling through to the finish in game fashion and repelled the challenge to inch away at the end to prevail. SANDY'S GARDEN chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, rallied up the rail to engage the leader in head to head combat through the final furlong fighting on game but was ultimately rebuffed and denied at the end. SIKUM grew a bit fractious in the gate when SARATOGA CHROME needed adjusting, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to latch on the runner up as she hit the finish. I'M NERVOUS NOW chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. SARATOGA CHROME broke out at the start bumping KERRY, chased three to four wide down the backstretch before tucking to the two path at the half mile pole when placed to coaxing, swung three wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. KERRY got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. BUNTY WINDERMERE pressed the pace of QUEENS DANCER from the outside three then two wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the final furlong. SUMMER AT THE SPA bobbled at the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Dancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, set down 2w 1/4p, dug in, dueled stretch, gamely

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell David E and Powers Sandra
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-4w early, 2p turn, 3w upper, belated bid

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious gate, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 7-8w uppr, mild kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 12 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 91. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). ( Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALLIE'S GRIT went to the front, showed the way while well rated in the two path, was given her cue in the three path into the stretch, responded well into the final furlong, drifted out outside the sixteenth-pole and held sway under steady urging. SHE'S MO BUBBLY stalked the pace on the outside in the three path, chased on the far turn, was driven four wide into the stretch, pursued the winner into the final furlong, kept on into the final sixteenth, gained on the aforementioned foe late but missed while clear for the place. TAWARET was taken in hand while off heels after the start, raced under restraint into the first turn, saved ground while rated off the pace, came under urging late on the backstretch, chased on the far turn, moved to the two path outside the quarter-pole and lacked the needed response while along for the show. SOUTHAMPTON DOCK was rated just off the pace on the inside, came under urging with a half-mile to run, chased inside on the far turn and lacked the needed kick. FIZZY broke out and hit the gate then bumped with a foe, went three wide on the first turn, settled at the rear, dropped from the three path to the rail on the far turn and failed to rally. MACHIAVELLIQUE was restless in the gate, traveled two to three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along in the two path on the far turn and came up empty. DUKE GIRLS was bumped at the start, tracked the pace on the outside in the four path, was roused nearing the half-mile pole, chased four wide on the far turn and tired. BEL ROSSO was caught five wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused near the nine-sixteenths, raced four wide on the far turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Southampton Dock
ENTRY.OWNER: Wilson Deborah V and Six Column Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off pace,inside,ask1/2,chased 2nd turn,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tawaret
ENTRY.COMMENT: off heels after brk,in hand,rated inside,ask1/2,chsd,2p1/4,up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Machiavellique
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,2-3p1st,settled,urged 2path2nd turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Callie's Grit
ENTRY.OWNER: Grady Brad and Moore Carl R
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated 2path,ask3p1/4,drift out ins1/8,responded,held sway

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside 3path,chased 2nd turn,4w1/4,kept on,missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w1st,settled outside,urged 4w2nd turn,no response
